title: Check out our amazing location! 3 bed, 2 bath. Gardenwood Apartments
posting_body: ['3 Bedroom  2 Bathroom | 1348 sq ft | $1846/Month', 'Gardenwood Apartments', '1110 Garden Walk Blvd', 'College Park, GA 30349', 'show contact info', 'Description:', "The living spaces at Gardenwood Apartments are thoughtfully designed for comfort and convenience in mind, and are stylishly appointed with the kind of premium materials and finishes you won't find in any other rental apartments in College Park!", 'Apartment Amenities:', '❖ Air conditioning - central air', '❖ Cable Ready', '❖ Carpet', '❖ Ceiling Fans', '❖ Dining Room', '❖ Dishwasher', '❖ Disposal', '❖ Family Room', '❖ Fireplace - Wood Burning', '❖ High Speed Internet Available', '❖ Patio/Balcony', '❖ Range w/Oven', '❖ Refrigerator w/Ice Maker', '❖ Smoke Free', '❖ Sunroom', '❖ Walk-In Closets', '❖ Washer/Dryer Connections in 2 & 3 BR', '❖ Wheelchair Accessible (Rooms)', '❖ Window Coverings', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '❖ 24hr.', 'Emergency maintenance', '❖ Cabana', '❖ Clubhouse', '❖ Condition very good', '❖ Controlled Access Gates', '❖ Courtyard', '❖ Excellent access', '❖ Great guest parking', '❖ Green and flowered areas', '❖ Laundry Facilities', '❖ Nature Trails', '❖ On-Site Maintenance', '❖ Organized Activities', '❖ Package Service', '❖ Pet Care', '❖ Property Manager on Site', '❖ Two playground areas', '❖ Two pools', '❖ Two tennis courts', '❖ Walking/Biking Trails', 'Additional Details:', 'Deposit: Call', 'Terms: 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Pets: We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.', 'There is a $300 non-refundable pet fee for each pet.', 'The weight limit is 50 pounds per pet.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Please contact leasing office for complete pet policy details.', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'EF2E8D3BE7334F5']
